Scene:
The Selling of Okaru
(Okaru miuri / お軽身売り)

Play: The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

Production: October 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Rodayū V (豊竹呂大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))
